name: MCBVIRadio
0:
”Alexa play, m. c. b. v. i. radio”
”Alexa launch, m. c. b. v. i. radio”
”Alexa ask, m. c. b. v. i. radio what is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. c. b. v. i. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MCBVI Radio is owned by the Michigan Council Of the Blind and Visually Impaired. We are a consumer group and we advocate for the betterment of blind people.
Three of our presenters are retired DJS and while it certainly is not a prerequisite, many of our presenters, including the engineer are blind.

From blue grass to blues, from old to new, from country to rock, and from single artists to super groups, we've got it all, just for you. You can also make requests during automation. If you have suggestions or comments please Email management@mcbvi-radio.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
